application.name: 数钱数到手抽筋
application.description: 窥探朋友私密的一面，看看朋友发表的秘密、八卦、爆料、真心话
application.author: 好资源

manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_weiyun_shuqian_setting` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `title` varchar(100) DEFAULT '' COMMENT '网站名称', `share_title` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `share_image` varchar(500) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `share_desc` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `share_cancel` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `share_num` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `share_url` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `follow_url` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `dateline` int(10) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=1 ;
